attributes.action: To remove or reduce Parliament’s recess dates whilst there is a national crisis
attributes.additional_details:
About the recess, Labour’s Margaret Hodge stated in 2013 “We are not spending enough time in Westminster, and this creates a democratic vacuum. The executive can go on and you cannot hold them to the account. It feels as if we are hardly working."
Link https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2013/apr/21/mps-lazy-hours-margaret-hodge
attributes.background: During this declared National Crisis over Brexit, which currently grinds this country down economically and physically, I petition Parliament to reduce the summer recess time table,  in order for MPs to have more time to find a way forward, or a resolution.
